verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> The song הַשִּׁירִ֖ים <WH7892> of songs אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לִשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> which [is] Solomon's

יִשָּׁקֵ֙נִי֙ <WH5401> Let him kiss מִנְּשִׁיק֣וֹת <WH5390> me with the kisses פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> of his mouth כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for טוֹבִ֥ים <WH2896> [is] better דֹּדֶ֖יךָ <WH1730> for thy love מִיָּֽיִן׃ <WH3196> than wine

לְרֵ֙יחַ֙ <WH7381> Because of the savour שְׁמָנֶ֣יךָ <WH8081> ointments טוֹבִ֔ים <WH2896> of thy good שֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> [is as] ointment תּוּרַ֣ק <WH7324> poured forth שְׁמֶ֑ךָ <WH8034> thy name עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that עֲלָמ֥וֹת <WH5959> therefore do the virgins אֲהֵבֽוּךָ׃ <WH157> love

מָשְׁכֵ֖נִי <WH4900> Draw אַחֲרֶ֣יךָ <WH310> after נָּר֑וּצָה <WH7323> me we will run הֱבִיאַ֨נִי <WH935> hath brought הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> thee the king חֲדָרָ֗יו <WH2315> me into his chambers נָגִ֤ילָה <WH1523> we will be glad וְנִשְׂמְחָה֙ <WH8055> and rejoice בָּ֔ךְ נַזְכִּ֤ירָה <WH2142> in thee we will remember דֹדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1730> thy love מִיַּ֔יִן <WH3196> more than wine מֵישָׁרִ֖ים <WH4339> the upright אֲהֵבֽוּךָ׃ <WH157> love ס

שְׁחוֹרָ֤ה <WH7838> I [am] black אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I וְֽנָאוָ֔ה <WH5000> but comely בְּנ֖וֹת <WH1323> O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כְּאָהֳלֵ֣י <WH168> as the tents קֵדָ֔ר <WH6938> of Kedar כִּירִיע֖וֹת <WH3407> as the curtains שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> of Solomon

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּרְא֙וּנִי֙ <WH7200> Look שֶׁאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I שְׁחַרְחֹ֔רֶת <WH7840> not upon me because I [am] black שֶׁשֱּׁזָפַ֖תְנִי <WH7805> hath looked הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> because the sun בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> children אִמִּ֣י <WH517> upon me my mother's נִֽחֲרוּ־ <WH2787> were angry בִ֗י שָׂמֻ֙נִי֙ <WH7760> with me they made נֹטֵרָ֣ה <WH5201> me the keeper אֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּרָמִ֔ים <WH3754> of the vineyards כַּרְמִ֥י <WH3754> [but] mine own vineyard שֶׁלִּ֖י לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not נָטָֽרְתִּי׃ <WH5201> have I not kept

הַגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> Tell לִּ֗י שֶׁ֤אָהֲבָה֙ <WH157> loveth נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> me O thou whom my soul אֵיכָ֣ה <WH349> where תִרְעֶ֔ה <WH7462> where thou feedest אֵיכָ֖ה <WH349> how תַּרְבִּ֣יץ <WH7257> thou makest [thy flock] to rest בַּֽצָּהֳרָ֑יִם <WH6672> at noon שַׁלָּמָ֤ה <WH4100> for אֶֽהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> become כְּעֹ֣טְיָ֔ה <WH5844> why should I be as one that turneth aside עַ֖ל <WH5921> Beside עֶדְרֵ֥י <WH5739> by the flocks חֲבֵרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH2270> companion

אִם־ <WH518> If לֹ֤א <WH3808> not תֵדְעִי֙ <WH3045> If thou know לָ֔ךְ הַיָּפָ֖ה <WH3303> not O thou fairest בַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <WH802> among women צְֽאִי־ <WH3318> go thy way forth לָ֞ךְ בְּעִקְבֵ֣י <WH6119> by the footsteps הַצֹּ֗אן <WH6629> of the flock וּרְעִי֙ <WH7462> and feed אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדִיֹּתַ֔יִךְ <WH1429> thy kids עַ֖ל <WH5921> By מִשְׁכְּנ֥וֹת <WH4908> tents הָרֹעִֽים׃ <WH7462> beside the shepherds' ס
לְסֻסָתִי֙ <WH5484> to a company of horses בְּרִכְבֵ֣י <WH7393> chariots פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> in Pharaoh's דִּמִּיתִ֖יךְ <WH1819> I have compared רַעְיָתִֽי׃ <WH7474> thee O my love
נָאו֤וּ <WH4998> are comely לְחָיַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH3895> Thy cheeks בַּתֹּרִ֔ים <WH8447> with rows צַוָּארֵ֖ךְ <WH6677> [of jewels] thy neck בַּחֲרוּזִֽים׃ <WH2737> with chains
תּוֹרֵ֤י <WH8447> thee borders זָהָב֙ <WH2091> of gold נַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> We will make לָּ֔ךְ עִ֖ם <WH5973> With נְקֻדּ֥וֹת <WH5351> with studs הַכָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> of silver
עַד־ <WH5704> While שֶׁ֤הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> While the king בִּמְסִבּ֔וֹ <WH4524> [sitteth] at his table נִרְדִּ֖י <WH5373> my spikenard נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> sendeth forth רֵיחֽוֹ׃ <WH7381> the smell

צְר֨וֹר <WH6872> A bundle הַמֹּ֤ר ׀ <WH4753> of myrrh דּוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> [is] my wellbeloved לִ֔י בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between שָׁדַ֖י <WH7699> all night betwixt my breasts יָלִֽין׃ <WH3885> unto me he shall lie
אֶשְׁכֹּ֨ל <WH811> [is] unto me [as] a cluster הַכֹּ֤פֶר ׀ <WH3724> of camphire דּוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> My beloved לִ֔י בְּכַרְמֵ֖י <WH3754> in the vineyards עֵ֥ין גֶּֽדִי׃ <WH5872> of Engedi ס

הִנָּ֤ךְ <WH2005> behold יָפָה֙ <WH3303> Behold thou [art] fair רַעְיָתִ֔י <WH7474> my love הִנָּ֥ךְ <WH2005> behold יָפָ֖ה <WH3303> behold thou [art] fair עֵינַ֥יִךְ <WH5869> eyes יוֹנִֽים׃ <WH3123> thou [hast] doves'

הִנְּךָ֨ <WH2005> behold יָפֶ֤ה <WH3303> Behold thou [art] fair דוֹדִי֙ <WH1730> my beloved אַ֣ף <WH637> so נָעִ֔ים <WH5273> yea pleasant אַף־ <WH637> Indeed עַרְשֵׂ֖נוּ <WH6210> also our bed רַעֲנָנָֽה׃ <WH7488> [is] green
קֹר֤וֹת <WH6982> The beams בָּתֵּ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1004> of our house אֲרָזִ֔ים <WH730> [are] cedar [רַחִיטֵנוּ כ] (רַהִיטֵ֖נוּ <WH7351> rafter ק) בְּרוֹתִֽים׃ <WH1266> of fir
